title: Verify Insurance Eligibility
description: A front desk staff member needs to verify a patient's insurance eligibility for an upcoming appointment.

tasks.description: Locate the patient's appointment and their registered insurance information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the patient's chart and their primary insurance policy details.

tasks.description: Submit an electronic eligibility request (270 query) to the payer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent uses the eligibility tool to send the request to the insurance company.

tasks.description: Review the eligibility response (271), confirm the policy is active, and note the patient's copay amount.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent receives a response confirming active coverage and updates the patient's record with the copay amount.
